items.translated_title: Speechify adds voice typing and voice assistant to its Chrome extension
items.content: In the last 12 months, there has been a proliferation of voice detection tools, thanks to overall quality improvement in speech recognition models. Speechify is hitching its wagon to this train and launching its own dictation tool with support for English.

items.translated_title: Spotify to raise US prices in first quarter of next year, report says

images.alt: Spotify, Apple Music on smart phone screen.

items.content: Major record labels have been urging Spotify and other music streaming platforms to raise subscription prices, arguing that fees have not kept pace with inflation and remain low when compared to services like Netflix.

items.title: A new AI benchmark tests whether chatbots protect human wellbeing (原标题: A new AI benchmark tests whether chatbots protect human well-being)
items.creator: Rebecca Bellan
items.summary: 无法生成摘要（API请求失败）。
items.translated_title: A new AI benchmark tests whether chatbots protect human wellbeing
items.content: Most AI benchmarks measure intelligence and instruction-following rather than psychological safety. Humane Bench evaluates models based on core principles of human flourishing, prioritizing well-being, and respecting user attention.
